title: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor
description: Bug 13725Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
OB: When selecting 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original. However, if the steps to reproduce are followed and the file is closed and reopened, it only takes about 8 seconds.
SR:
1) Open the file 'org.eclipse.swt.custom.StyledText.java' in the Eclipse SWT Custom Widgets source folder. 
2) Modify the file by adding a space character at the end of the first line to mark it as dirty. 
3) Close the editor by clicking on the close box in the editor tab and select 'no' when prompted to save changes. 
4) Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it. 
5) Repeat steps 1) and 2). 
6) Select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor. 
7) Observe that it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
